title: RGIP: A Votre Santé Claus
description: It's Christmastime on Real Girlfriends in Paris, which means there are miracles — Margaux leaving her apartment! — and yuletides wishes — Kacey begging someone to do her Visa stuff for her. But most importantly, the angels sing... or cry to their coworkers about Yoanne.
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
